By GoldenBoy on Monday, January 13, 2003 - 03:30 pm:

Here's a statgain table of all breed Tecmo has posted so far.

Tonight I will add composite ranks for each breed.
I will also add breeds as Tecmo posts them, only 7 to go.

A good use for this would be with Microsoft Excel and the Sort Function. If you want possible combos of good POW/SPD monsters or whatever criteria you are looking for.

BreedGroupPOWINTACCSPDDEFLIF
ArrowheadArtificialBDDCAD
DuckenArtificialBBDBBE
DurahanArtificialADBEAD
GolemArtificialADDEAB
HengerArtificialBABCDD
MewArtificialCCBBDC
ZanArtificialBDBADD
HareBeastADBADD
MogiBeastBBBCDD
MomoBeastCDBACD
RaidenBeastACBCDD
TigerBeastDCBADC
ZuumBeastBDCCCC
DoodleFanciful
GitanFancifulBBCBDD
MocchiFancifulBCCDBC
NagaFancifulBDBDCB
OctopeeFancifulBBBBEB
PSI-RollerFancifulADDBDB
SuezoFancifulCABDDD
DragonSpiritABCDCB
GaliSpiritDADBBD
JokerSpiritBABBDD
MonolSpiritBCCEAD
PhoenixSpirit
AntlanSpriteBCCDBD
GaruSpriteBDCDBD
LesioneSpriteBCCDCB
PixieSpriteDABAED
SuzurinSpriteDBCDAD

By Jimeous on Saturday, August 9, 2003 - 09:44 pm:

I decided to take a break from LifeSpans to leech the growth potential from the game itself :p

These tables represents the potential a monster has when awarded stats. The higher the number, the more likely you'll get better results.

Example: Pixies have a good growth rate in INT, this suggests its the easiest attribute to increase
